choices.text:
in python make a plot that compares two columns in a dataframe.
Sure, I can help you with that! Here's an example code snippet to create a bar chart comparing the values of two columns in a pandas DataFrame using matplotlib library:
```python
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
data = {'col1': [10, 20, 30], 'col2': [5, 15, 25]}
df = pd.DataFrame(data)
plt.bar(['Col1', 'Col2'], df['col1'])
plt.xlabel('Column Label')
plt.ylabel('Value')
plt.title('Comparison of Column Values')
plt.show()
```
This code will create a bar chart with two columns labeled as "Col1" and "Col2", where the values in each column are compared to the corresponding bars in the chart. You can customize the title, labels, and colors of the bars as per your preference.
